entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8 except minus 3 along the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8 except minus 3 along the coast. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 12 except minus 6 along the coast.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 overnight. Low minus 12 except minus 6 along the coast. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 07 January 2023
